description: Perceptual audio encoding format designed for efficient distribution of sound files over moderate bandwidth connections; may be used at higher data rates for better fidelity. AAC_MP4 compression is a further refinement of AAC_MP2.
name: ISO/IEC 14496-3:2001. Information technology -- Coding of audio-visual objects -- Part 3: Audio. Formal name for the relevant part of the MPEG-4 standard; note that this part covers several types of audio coding including Advanced Audio Coding. Common name: AAC.
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension">aac</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
